description:
#### Issue

Login the App using the credentials.
After getting the Dashboard page, go to the accounts section.
If the list of accounts is long, the + button at the bottom right scrolls up along with the list.
Issue: The + button at the bottom right of the accounts page should not scroll up along with the accounts list. Since applying for accounts is a very less used option, hence remove that button and add a new button at the end of the list.

Remember, the add button with the most preferable UX(according to our maintainers) will be added.

#### Steps to be followed by beginners

1. Go to app > src > pages > accounts-page

2. Open accounts.html

3. Delete the line(S) which add the + button.

4.  add the button at end of ion-list

5. Submit the PR link as work submission.

 Find more about the buttons:- https://ionicframework.com/docs/api/button
 More about Icons:- https://ionicons.com/
 About git and making a PR:- https://opensource.com/article/19/7/create-pull-request-github
name: Add a + button at the end of the accounts page.
